ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He gives life and causes to die and you will be returned to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He is the giver of life and death, and to Him you will return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He it is Who gives life and causes death, and to Him shall you all be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is God who gives life and causes things to die. To Him you will all return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And He gives life and gives death, and towards Him you will return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: It is He Who gives life, and causes death, and to Him you (all) shall return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He gives life and causes death, and to Him you shall be brought back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He gives life, and makes to die, and to Him you shall be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He quickeneth and giveth death, and unto Him ye will be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He gives life and brings about death, and to Him you shall all return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He giveth life and causeth to die, and unto Him ye shall be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: It is He who gives life and brings death, and to Him you shall be brought back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It is He Who giveth life and who taketh it, and to Him shall ye all be brought back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: It is He Who gives life, and causes death, and to Him you (all) shall return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It is He who gives life and causes death, and to Him you shall be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He gives life and causes death, and to Him you will be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He gives life and causes death, and to Him you will be returned
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [10:56] He gives life and makes to die, and to Him you shall be returned, in the Hereafter, and He shall requite you for your deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He quickeneth) upon the Resurrection (and giveth death) in the life of this world, (and unto Him ye will be returned) after death.
